function.note: R package. It provides a list of functions to integrate validated and predicted miRNAs into graphite pathway topologies. It takes as input an expression matrix with matched miRNA and gene expression data (divided into two classes of samples) and a list of graphs (pathways). Then it performs a recursive topological pathway analysis, giving back the circuit associated the most to the phenotype

summary.description: R package for topological pathway analysis integrating gene and miRNA expression profiles using validated and/or predicted miRNA-target interactions. It is based on updated versions of graphite and CliPPER Bioconductor packages dedicated to pathway analyses recently proposed by our group.
summary.name: micrographite
